data.title: Herzog Friedrich (the One Eyed) von Swabia II
data.meta_description: Pedigree report of Herzog Friedrich (the One Eyed) von Swabia II, son of Friedrich Hohenstaufen I, Duke of Swabia and Agnes Salian of Germany, born about 1090. the One Eyed had a wife named Agnes von SaarbrÃ¼cken and a child named Conrad.
data.text:
Friedrich, known as the One Eyed, was born about 1090. The One Eyed's father was Friedrich Hohenstaufen I, Duke of Swabia and his mother was Agnes Salian of Germany. His maternal grandfather was Heinrich IV, Holy Roman Emperor. He was an only child. He died on April 6th, 1147.

General Notes

He married, firstly, Judith von Bayern, daughter of Heinrich IX Herzog von Bayern and Wolfhildis von Sachsen, before 1123. He married, secondly, Agnes von SaarbrÃ¼cken, daughter of Friedrich Graf von SaarbrÃ¼cken, in 1135.

Children of Friedrich II Herzog von Swabia and Judith von Bayern

* Jutta Hohenstaufen+ d. 1191

* Friedrich I 'Barbarossa' Hohenstaufen, Holy Roman Emperor+ b. 1123, d. 1190

* Bertha von Swabia+ b. b 1128, d. 1195

Child of Friedrich II Herzog von Swabia and Agnes von SaarbrÃ¼cken

* Conrad Pfalzgraf von der Rhein+ b. b 1147, d. 1195
